title: Low level games full of TROLLS
body:
We all know it. It's not going to get fixed, we know that too. 

I just got a 14 day suspension for telling off a Lee Sin that locked in jungle and followed me in game, trolling and wasting everyones time. (we lost and never stood a chance since 0:00).

Amazing.

Fun game, terrible people pulling the strings over in the support and bans area.

Time to uninstall and actually do something with my life now :)

replies.body: its the bots that bother me more.

Fuck this game, this board, this company, fuck the king.

I hope the shit %%%%s pulling the strings over at Riot 'accidentally' tie one around their necks and pull it very, very tight.
If this is your idea of "telling someone off" then it should be very clear to you why you got banned.
Go play ARAM, have 4 ad champs and a leblanc, watch the leblanc go AD. That's life bro.

Life? No. That's League of Legends. It's bullshit, which us why I uninstalled.

I can't believe political correctness has found its way so deep under the finger nails of our society that when someone acts like a %%%%, and gets called out on it, they are not punished but I am.

Not to mention I have never been banned and didn't even get a warning? Or a one day ban? Nope, 14 days and go fuck yourself on top.

Great logic, Riot!

%%%%s. Bunch of %%%%s that need their head kicked in.
